oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, Willie E., 1889 September 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account sales list of personal property of Willie E. Allen, “sold by J. D. Brown, Admr.,” subscribed and sworn on September 2nd, 1889. Illustrates the first page of the document. Notation: “Rec. in Book of Wills, no. 30, pgs. [314?]” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
